jobsJson.descriptionPlain: We are looking for a strong individual contributor and a team player to support our GoTroops in Singapore.
jobsJson.description: We are looking for a strong individual contributor and a team player to support our GoTroops in Singapore.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Design, plan and engineer different network platforms and systems to meet product specification and operational requirements
  • Provide support in maintaining internal system and servers, IT support to colleagues and carry out IT policies in Singapore office
  • Assist in inventory control of networking and IT assets in accordance with company policy
  • Carry out emergency duties

• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent
  • Background in Computer Science preferred
  • Has minimum experience of 3 years of experience as Network/IT Engineer
  • Information Technology or related field of study
  • Have strong knowledge in switching and routing protocol (router, switch, etc), wireless technologies (Cisco WLC, Aruba, etc), collaboration technologies (zoom conference, etc), desktop and OS (laptop, desktop, linux, windows, mac)
